doc:
Paul Ryan (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Ryan_(actor) 0 Paul Ryan (June 11, 1945 – April 23, 2015), born Bernard Paul Feldman, was an American actor, producer and television personality. His television roles included bit parts in Bewitched, Emergency!, Mission: Impossible, Night Court, Murder, She Wrote and Desperate Housewives. His film appearances include Coma (1978), The Promise (1979), Star 80 (1983), and Fast Forward (1985).Ryan also worked as a correspondent for Entertainment Tonight and KTLA Morning News. Paul_Ryan ( June_11_,_1945 – April_23_,_2015 ) , born Bernard_Paul_Feldman , was an_American_actor_,_producer_and_television_personality . His_television_roles included bit_parts in Bewitched , Emergency ! , Mission : Impossible , Night_Court , Murder , She Wrote and Desperate_Housewives . His_film_appearances include Coma_(_1978_) , The_Promise_(_1979_) , Star_80_(_1983_) , and Fast_Forward_(_1985_) . Ryan also worked as a_correspondent for Entertainment_Tonight_and_KTLA_Morning_News .
